game.name: Mango Shooter
game.description:
It is time to put your shooting skill to test in this one of the best free online games available here on our website. Do you think you are capable enough to take this challenge right now? Join Mango Shooter and show the world that you are a real shooter of all the time! Your focus and excellent archery skills will also help you to achieve the goal of game. This brand new action packed game is suitable for children and grown-ups irrespective of their gender and location. 
Your objective in this cool sling shooter game is to shoot all manages you see on the screen. Remember you will have only the limited number of stones to grab these target mangoes. So, use the stones wisely to shoot mangoes before pink birds eat them. Do not forget to shoot the violet birds to obtain several bonus stones. Also, try to be react fast before pink birds attack your favorite fruits which you will find in different sizes and colors. 

Use your best sling shots to complete all levels and become a popular shooter of your city! In this cool HTML5 game, you will have 10 arrows to shoot managoes. You will lose one arrow count if miss one shot. This fun sling game features colorful graphics, realistic smooth animations and awesome sound and music effects. Use the appropriate power to throw stones at your targets and add more points to the final score! We as a free online game portal promise you to help find the best shooter games. Good luck to make the most out of the digital world!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Mango Shooter at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE AND RELESE THE SCREEN TO SHOOT THE MANGO
game.webControlKeys: HOLD AND RELESE LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE TO SHOOT THE MANGO
